detectors.description: EncryptedToken.fallback() (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#156-160) ignores return value by owner.send(msg.value) (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#157)

owned.transferOwnership(address) (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#15-17) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#16)

owned.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#15) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#16)

detectors.description:
Version constraint ^0.4.25 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.25 (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#1)

Reentrancy in EncryptedToken.fallback() (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#156-160):
	External calls:
	- owner.send(msg.value) (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#157)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _transfer(owner,msg.sender,amount) (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#159)
		- balanceOf[_from] -= _value (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#130)
		- balanceOf[_to] += _value (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#131)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(_from,_to,_value) (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#132)
		- _transfer(owner,msg.sender,amount) (0xd40c2daf2b55fbf5532ddeada3febe738f431dfe.sol#159)
